definition: to lift a ban/to lift a curfew

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: Hulan is the earliest open region of Qin Dynasty in the northeast China.
sentences.chinese: 呼蘭是清政府在東北最早開禁的地區。

sentences.english: Horse race betting in the Mainland has yet to lifting the ban.
sentences.chinese: 賽馬博彩在內地至今尚未開禁。

sentences.english: Ma Cai is also lifting the ban has been a sensitive topic.
sentences.chinese: 馬彩開禁亦一直是敏感的話題。
